27
28#include "qtqrcodepainter.h"
29
30#include <QSize>
31#include <QRectF>
32#include <QSvgGenerator>
33
34QtQrCodePainter::QtQrCodePainter(float margin, const QBrush &background, const QBrush &foreground)
35 : m_margin(margin), m_offsetX(0.0), m_offsetY(0.0), m_svgPaint(false),
36 m_background(background), m_foreground(foreground)
37{
38}
39
40QtQrCodePainter::~QtQrCodePainter()
41{
42}
43
44void QtQrCodePainter::paint(const QtQrCode &qrCode, QPainter &painter)
45{
46 this->paint(qrCode, painter, qrCode.width() + m_margin * 2);
47}
48
49void QtQrCodePainter::paint(const QtQrCode &qrCode, QPainter &painter, int width, int height)
50{
51 m_offsetX = 0.0;
52 m_offsetY = 0.0;
53 int painterWidt = 0;
54 float aspect = width/(float) height;
55 if (aspect > 1.0) {
56 painterWidt = height;
57 m_offsetX = width/2.0 - painterWidt/2.0;
58 } else {
59 painterWidt = width;
60 m_offsetY = height/2.0 - painterWidt/2.0;
61 }
62 this->paint(qrCode, painter, painterWidt);
63}
64
65void QtQrCodePainter::paint(const QtQrCode &qrCode, QPainter &painter, int painterWidth)
66{
67 if (qrCode.data().isEmpty())
68 return;
69 int width = qrCode.width();
70 float aux = (m_svgPaint) ? 0.05 : 0.0;
71 unsigned char *data = (unsigned char *) qrCode.data().constData();
72 if (width < 0)
73 width = 1;
74 float scale = (painterWidth - 2.0*m_margin)/ (float) width;
75 QRectF rectangle(m_offsetX, m_offsetY, painterWidth, painterWidth);
76 painter.setPen(Qt::NoPen);
77 painter.setBrush(m_foreground);
78 painter.setClipRect(rectangle);
79 painter.fillRect(rectangle, m_background);
80
81 for(int y = 0; y < width; ++y) {
82 for(int x = 0; x < width; ++x, ++data) {
83 if(*data & 0x1)
84 painter.drawRect(QRectF(m_offsetX + m_margin + x*scale - aux,
85 m_offsetY + m_margin + y*scale - aux,
86 scale + 2*aux, scale + 2*aux));
87 }
88 }
89 m_svgPaint = false;
90}
91
92QImage QtQrCodePainter::toImage(const QtQrCode &qrCode, int size)
93{
94 if (size < 0 || qrCode.data().isEmpty())
95 return QImage();
96
97 int width = qrCode.width() + m_margin * 2;
98 QImage img(width, width, QImage::Format_ARGB32);
99
100 QPainter painter(&img);
101 this->paint(qrCode, painter);
102
103 if (size > 0)
104 return img.scaled(size, size);
105 return img;
106}
107
108bool QtQrCodePainter::saveSvg(const QtQrCode &qrCode, const QString &fileName, int size)
109{
110 if (fileName.isEmpty() || size < 0 || qrCode.data().isEmpty())
111 return false;
112
113 QSvgGenerator svgGenerator;
114 svgGenerator.setFileName(fileName);
115 svgGenerator.setSize(QSize(size, size));
116 int width = qrCode.width() + m_margin * 2;
117 svgGenerator.setViewBox(QRectF(0, 0, width, width));
118
119 m_svgPaint = true;
120 QPainter painter(&svgGenerator);
121 this->paint(qrCode, painter);
122
123 return true;
124}
